comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Queen Victoria .... and Prince Albert.  Both statues have been moved around the Square, like a game of chess.

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: The Queen Victoria monument was unveiled in 1888 - www.publicartaroundtheworld.com/Queen_Victoria_Monument.html I cannot see any trace of the cable tram lines seen here - www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/3022880907/ which implies the date is between 1888 and 1894. The original lamps and bollards were removed. and 'landscapers' were let loose (early 1900s? with electric tram lines) www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/2696680241/

comment.author: 70889503@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Historical Gardens, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
